body.p: The Wine development release 1.5.29 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Input method support in the Mac driver.
Support for TLS 1.1 and 1.2 connections on Mac OS X.
JavaScript performance improvements.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
